article: the eight annual race takes place on shrove tuesday in hinckleystart limbering up and practice your flipping because its nearly time for the annual hinckley bid pancake race . once again castle street in the town centre will be the scene of running , tossing and occasionally falling as competitors battle it out for the prestigious trophy . starting at 12 noon on shrove tuesday , this year the race falls on february 13 and will begin outside clarks shoe shop . all pancakes are provided but runners need to bring their own frying pans . entry is completely free and there are two categories : junior and senior .

individual or team entries welcome . there will be trophies for each race winner in each group and also an award for the ` funniest costume ' on the day , for those wishing to race in fancy dress . the mayor will present a neck medal to every entrant . you can even use the event as a fund raiser and get friends and family to sponsor you to help the good cause of your choice . for more information or to enter , please e-mail info@hinckleybid . co. uk or tel 01455 698494 .
